short_summary: Prepare land for a new foundation, including geotechnical investigations
duration_in_months: Bid deadline: 2023-09-14, contract start: 2023-09-27, contract end: 2023-10-20
full_summary:
**Geotechnical Investigation – MCISAR St. Mary’s River**

**Reference Number:** cb-8628-50170899
**Solicitation Number:** 30004449

**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** August 30, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 14, 2023, 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 27, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** October 20, 2023

**Status:** This tender is now expired.

**Description:** Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), Central and Arctic Region, is seeking a contract for geotechnical investigations at various navigational aid sites in and around St. Joseph Island, ON. The scope of work includes on-site investigations, including drilling boreholes, and compiling geotechnical investigation reports detailing findings and recommendations. The completed report will inform the development of a construction specification to replace the existing aid to navigation towers.

**Information:**

* **Contact:** Paige Yang, DFO, [pg.yang@dfo-mypo.gc.ca](mailto:pg.yang@dfo-mypo.gc.ca), (250) 616-1838
* **Notes:** All enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than five calendar days before the bid closing date.

**Attachments:**

* Various geotechnical investigation reports and drawings

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Documentation:**

The RFP documentation inclusive of all addenda is accessible online at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) (no: 30004449)

http://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8628/30004449-rfp_english.pdf, for the English version)
